question: 私立
sourceMnemonic: The place where <kanji>I</kanji> <kanji>stand</kanji> is my own <vocabulary>private</vocabulary> area. Think of the "circle of personal space." This is where you stand plus an arm's length. This area is very private to you. Who knows what you do in your own private area.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
